item.description:
Next meeting will be Tuesday, November 20th from 7-9PM.

Come with your knowledge, challenges and helpful hints.  We all can improve our health and reduce our pain, we just need to share the information that helps us to help others.

My fibromyalgia workshop has been scheduled for Saturday, November 17th from 1-3:30PM at the Unitarian Church on Woburn Street in Reading.  A meetup announcement will be sent separately with more details.  You can reserve a space (limited seating) by prepaying.

Hope to see as many of you as possible in November.

Enjoy the foliage folks!

 

Betsy

PS Donations are always welcome to help defray my meeting room and meetup coss.
item.how_to_find_us: Upstairs in the Senior Center Lounge, elevator to right on first floor through double doors
item.name: Have a Support Group meeting
